title: Cinnamon and apple iced buns and toffee and marmalade iced buns
description: Two varieties of sticky buns filled with gorgeous apple and orange flavours. Tricky to eat but no less of a treat for it.For this recipe you will need: a freestanding mixer fitted with a dough hook, 2 baking trays, a food processor and a sugar thermometer.
ingredients: 735g/1lb 9½oz very strong bread flour, plus extra for dusting
6 clementines, juice and peel only (250ml/9fl oz juice required), peel sliced into thin strips
500g/1lb 2oz Bramley apples, peeled, cored and grated
